# Alejo Maps



## Description

Map application using Mapbox API to search for addresses, the distance between the destination and the user, the time it would take to reach the destination by car and the best route to follow.

[![Instructions](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/59319966/316851364-fa69ee7f-7342-451c-a78e-2053a9fb0e79.jpg?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..cDCdqXrAVczxEsn2_wmz3YhuotefJWJageK-3o5sG8Y)]()

## Live Demo
## <a href="https://maps-alejove.netlify.app/" target="_blank" >See it here!</a>

- React
- Typescript
- CSS
- Mapbox
- Netlify
